content: Hey, I'm needing to create a list of practitioners that a given patient can send messages to for a communications app. Would using the list resource be the best approach for this or should I be looking into something like adding an operation?
Although focused on provider facing applications, the Argonaut Patient List project may address your use case if these lists are system generated.
Thanks for the link. It does look pretty close to what I'm looking for but will need to read more into it.
